function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to harmful chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","Impact":"Adverse health effects from exposure to strong chemical disinfectants and sanitizers","Mitigation":"Use non-toxic and eco-friendly disinfectant solutions, provide proper ventilation, and use protective equipment when applying disinfectants","Technologies":"Eco-friendly disinfectant solutions, ventilation systems, personal protective equipment (PPE)","People":"Healthcare workers, building occupants","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, building management"},{"Description":"Indoor air pollution from building materials and products","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory problems and other health issues due to poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Use low-pollutant-emitting building materials, conduct chemical emission testing, and develop smart construction materials","Technologies":"Low-pollutant-emitting building materials, chemical emission testing protocols, smart construction materials","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building developers, manufacturers"},{"Description":"Bio composite materials as an alternative to reduce indoor air pollutants","Impact":"Improved indoor air quality and reduced health risks due to the use of non-toxic and organic building materials","Mitigation":"Use bio composite materials, promote the adoption of green building materials, and conduct research on advanced construction materials","Technologies":"Bio composite materials, green building materials, advanced construction materials","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building developers, manufacturers"}]}
